testcase.classname: Feature to test the main menu functionality of Best Buy website
testcase.name: Check PQRS Brand Option displays valid result
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the homepage..............................................passed And User clicks Shop menu button............................................passed And User sees Brands option on left navigation..............................passed And User sees PQRS Brands option............................................passed When User clicks PQRS Brands option.........................................passed And User clicks Sony Brand..................................................passed Then User a new page launches with Sony products............................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test elements such as navigating to images, toggle-bars, dropdown, checkbox and a product link on Sony Product page
testcase.name: Test to Navigate through Images on Dot Navigation
testcase.system-out: Given Current page is Sony product page.....................................passed When User clicks on dots....................................................passed Then Corresponding images are displayed.....................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test elements such as navigating to images, toggle-bars, dropdown, checkbox and a product link on Sony Product page
testcase.name: Test In Stock and best Buy Toggle buttons on Sony Product page
testcase.system-out: Given Current page is Sony product page.....................................passed When User clicks on InStock Toggle Bar......................................passed And User clicks on BestBuy Toggle Bar.......................................passed Then InStock Toggle Bar toggles.............................................passed And BestBuy Toggle Bar toggles..............................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test elements such as navigating to images, toggle-bars, dropdown, checkbox and a product link on Sony Product page
testcase.name: Test Sort Dropdown on Sony Product page
testcase.system-out: Given Current page is Sony product page.....................................passed When User selects priceLowToHigh............................................passed And User checks Online Only checkbox........................................passed And User clicks on Playstation Image Box....................................passed Then User is directed towards Playstation page..............................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test iFrame functionality on Sony Play Station product page of Best Buy website
testcase.name: Check Advertisement
testcase.system-out: Given User is on a selected Play Station Page...............................passed When User clicks on a game from sponsorsed shop related product.............passed Then A different website launches with the game details.....................passed
